com.github.flowersinthesand.spheres

Interface SessionBase

  • All Superinterfaces:
    Wrapper
    All Known Subinterfaces:
    Session
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    DefaultSession, SessionBaseSupport

    public interface SessionBase
extends Wrapper
    The SessionBase is provided as an amorphous base interface for the Session interface that is a final interface for the application developer to interact a remote endpoint in realtime following the protocol.

    This concept is resulted from the thought that to support various application protocols and their all the fine features, abstracting into a single interface is not possible and not useful if ever.

    Author:
    Donghwan Kim

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      <T> T unwrap(Class<T> clazz)
      As an wrapper, the implementation should provide the underlying socket at least.
